name: Swedish Massage
short_desc: Swedish Massage works the soft tissues of the body to promote relaxation and reduce muscular tension.
long_desc: Swedish Massage is the gentle working of the body’s soft tissue through a mixture of strokes in order to break down fissures (knots), improve circulation and provide relaxation.
benefits: Reduce muscular aches and pains including headaches and backaches.
details: Treatments last anything from 30mins -1hr 30 depending on the treatment and include a client consultation. For first treatments allow an extra 15 minutes to go through the consultation form and agree any specific requirements.
desc_ultimate: A full body massage including a reflexology treatment tailored specifically to the your requirements.
desc_balance: A relaxing back massage coupled with a focussed reflexology treatment, relaxing and restoring the harmony between body and mind.
